The role of the Administrator is to support the iThuba Community Centre which is to serve as a liaison between the community and relevant stakeholders – identify, communicate, coordinate and monitor events, employment, skills development, and enterprise development opportunities for the community

Criteria:
Matric and a Relevant Tertiary Qualification
At least 2-3 years’ exp in an NGO or community volunteer work
At least 2 years’ experience in managing a team.
Min 3 years computer exp with office administration experience.
Interpersonal communication: Cultural sensitivity and ability to collaborate with all stakeholders.
Able to communicate in English and another African language.
MUST live in the Tongaat community.
Driver’s license
Own vehicle (preferred)

How to Apply:
Send your CV, ID, Qualifications and Proof of Address via the secure link: https://forms.gle/kxdbLmKR7r74cq3o9
Queries: shaverasayed@ithuba.africa  

Applications close on Monday, 15 January 2024
